aiTutor.title: Your Personal Learning Assistant
aiTutor.subtitle: Choose from a variety of AI-powered tools to accelerate your learning journey, from code generation to detailed explanations

chat.title: Smart Chat
chat.description: Talk to your personal AI assistant. Get instant answers, detailed clarifications, and simplified explanations for any difficult concept.

quiz.title: Interactive Quizzes
quiz.description: Test your understanding with AI-generated multiple choice questions. Get instant feedback and detailed explanations for each answer.

flashcards.title: Learning Flashcards
flashcards.description: Review key concepts with interactive flashcards. The spaced repetition algorithm ensures you remember information long-term.

summary.title: Smart Summaries
summary.description: Get focused summaries for each lesson. AI extracts key points and organizes them in an easy-to-understand format.

code.title: Interactive Code Editor
code.description: Write and test code directly in the platform. Get smart suggestions, instant error correction, and improvements for your code.

deepExplanation.title: Deep Explanation
deepExplanation.description: Explore complex concepts in depth. AI provides step-by-step explanations from basics to advanced details with real-world examples.

cta.title: Start Learning with AI Today
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of students learning faster and smarter

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the perfect plan for your learning journey. Upgrade anytime to unlock more features.

features.aiChats: 5 AI chats / day (10 / month with Learn+ mode)
features.uploadFiles: Upload files, each up to 100 pages / 10 MB in size

features.unlimitedAI: Unlimited AI chats (100 / day with Learn+ mode)
features.uploadFilesLarge: Upload files, each up to 2000 pages / 300 MB in size

features.permissions: Add, remove and set custom permissions for team members

questions.q1: What do I get with the Pro plan?
questions.q2: What do I get with the Team plan?
questions.q3: What payment methods do you offer?
questions.q4: Can I cancel my Sanatack plan at any time?

answers.q1: The Pro plan includes unlimited uploads, pastes, and records, unlimited AI chats (100/day with Learn+ mode), unlimited quiz generation, unlimited practice exams, 10 podcasts per day, and the ability to upload files up to 2000 pages / 300 MB in size. You'll have access to all core features to learn at the highest level.
answers.q2: The Team plan includes everything in Pro plus additional team-focused features: discounts that scale with team size, centralized team billing for easier management, shared spaces for collaboration, and the ability to add, remove, and set custom permissions for team members. It's perfect for study groups and teams with a minimum of 3 seats required.
answers.q3: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers for Team plans. All payments are processed securely through our payment partners.
answers.q4: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. If you cancel, you'll continue to have access to your plan until the end of your current billing period. No questions asked, and you can always resubscribe later.
answers.q5: Yes! We offer a 20% discount for students with a valid student email address (.edu). Simply verify your student status during checkout to receive your discount automatically.
answers.q6: We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee for all new subscriptions. If you're not satisfied with your plan for any reason, contact us within 14 days of purchase for a full refund. Refunds for annual plans are prorated after the first 14 days.
